resources.string: In case of data error and abnormal status of the watch, you can upload the data to our server through the problem feedback function for analysis of our after-sales personnel. In this process, the logs generated on the watch will be automatically collected and uploaded. These logs will be used for problems analysis only rather than for other purposes, and will be destroyed immediately after analysis. In the whole process, we will comply with our privacy policies. See privacy policies in Amazfit watch App for details.

"Um unseren Dienst zu verbessern, sammeln wir kontinuierlich ihre Herzfrequenz. Erhobene Daten werden nur für Forschungszwecke verwendet. Wenn die Erhebung aktiviert ist, erhöht dies den Stromverbrauch"

Um unseren Dienst zu verbessern, sammeln wir kontinuierlich ihre Herzfrequenz. Erhobene Daten werden nur für Forschungszwecke verwendet. Wenn die Erhebung aktiviert ist, erhöht dies den Stromverbrauch
"Click Ok to enable HBeacon function to slightly reduce the watch's battery life. You need to re-match your phone with the watch after the watch is automatically restarted."
Click Ok to disable HBeacon function. You need to re-match your phone with the watch after the watch is automatically restarted.
Upload fehlgeschlagen, versuchen Sie es erneut
Bitte versuchen Sie es erneut, nachdem Sie den Flugmodus ausgeschaltet haben

When the motion data collection is turned on, we will collect the original information from the sensor after the motion starts, and stop the collection immediately after the motion ends. These data will be submitted together with your feedbacks on watch problems to the server for analysis of our after-sales personnel. In this process, the logs generated on the watch will be automatically collected and uploaded. These logs will be used for problems analysis only rather than for other purposes, and will be destroyed immediately after analysis. In the whole process, we will comply with our privacy policies. See privacy policies in Amazfit watch App for details.
